## nihWeb - Romantic Birthday Surprise Website

This is a pure HTML/CSS/JavaScript romantic birthday website project with:
- Countdown timer page that auto-redirects at midnight
- Interactive surprise page with confetti, music, photo slideshow
- Fully responsive and accessible design
- No build process or frameworks required

### Project Structure
- `index.html` - Countdown landing page
- `surprise.html` - Birthday surprise page  
- `style.css` - Shared styles
- `images/` - Photo gallery
- `music/` - Background music

### How to Customize
1. Replace 'Sofia' with the recipient's name in both HTML files
2. Add photos to `/images/` folder (photo1.jpg, photo2.jpg, etc.)
3. Add a romantic song to `/music/song.mp3`
4. Update the love letter text in `surprise.html`
5. Adjust countdown date if needed (currently Dec 20)

### How to Run
Simply open `index.html` in any modern web browser. No build step or server required.
